title: The Thing With Leading in CSS · Matthias Ott – User Experience Designer
description: Matthias Ott is an independent user experience designer and developer from Stuttgart, Germany. Besides design practice he teaches Interface Prototyping at the Muthesius Academy of Fine Arts and Design, Kiel.
author: Matthias Ott

title: line-height
description: The line-height CSS property sets the height of a line box. It’s commonly used to set the distance between lines of text.
